HOME.TITLE: Seba Probashi - The faithful companion of expatriate life
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
Seba Probashi

Seba Probashi is a trusted organization that facilitates legal migration to the Middle East with the best visa services. We are committed to resolving all issues faced by expatriates.

Our Services:

  • Travel Abroad: Arranging the best and most reliable visas for the Middle East.
  • Outpass Service: Assisting expatriates in obtaining outpasses to return home if staying illegally.
  • Loan Support: Providing full support in obtaining loans from Probashi Kallyan Bank for migration or other needs.
  • Iqama Issue Resolution: Resolving iqama-related problems faced by expatriates.
  • 24/7 Customer Service: Ensuring support at any time for any needs of expatriates.

Seba Probashi works tirelessly to make your expatriate life simple, safe, and hassle-free.

SECURITY.TITLE: Apply for Life Security
SECURITY.SUBTITLE: Enter your details to apply for life security.
SECURITY.NOTICE:
Life Security Package

Expatriates living in the Middle East often face various challenges. Sometimes, due to financial constraints, it becomes impossible to send the deceased's body back to their home country. To solve these issues, we have introduced the Life Security Package.

Activate this service with a package price of only 150 Saudi Riyals and ensure your safety.

What the Life Security Package includes:

  • - Medical services during your stay abroad.
  • - Full responsibility for respectfully sending the deceased's body back to the home country.
  • - Complete procedures for handing over the body to the family.

Why this service is important for you:

Take responsibility for your own safety. Instead of depending on others, make the right decision today.

If you are interested in availing the package:

  1. - Fill out and submit the form we provide.
  2. - A representative will contact you soon via WhatsApp or phone.

Life Security: Your trust, our responsibility.

OUTPASS.TITLE: Outpass Request
OUTPASS.DESCRIPTION: Collect outpasses for illegal aliens to return home. Outpass will reach you in maximum 72 hours to 7 working days.
OUTPASS.NOTE: Outpass is a valid way to return to the country from the Middle East for illegal expatriates. An illegal Bangladeshi expatriate can apply to return to the country with an outpass from Saudi Arabia. An outpass is a temporary travel document that allows expatriates to return to the country. It is usually used when there is no passport or when the visa expires.
OUTPASS.POPUP_DESCRIPTION: Dear Customer, Before applying for an outpass, make sure to fill the form after confirming some points. You have to pay 2990 Saudi Riyal for the outpass application

LOAN.TITLE: Probashi Kallyan Bank
LOAN.DESC: Want to take a loan from Probashi Kallyan Bank for traveling abroad? On this page, you can learn about the loan process for traveling abroad, required documents, the loan procedure, the bank’s address, and contact numbers – everything you need to know is available here.
LOAN.PROCESS:
Expatriate Welfare Bank Loan Process

Follow these steps to complete the process of taking a loan from the Expatriate Welfare Bank for traveling abroad:

  1. - Submit your request through the portal.
  2. - Our representative will contact you shortly.
  3. - Prepare the required documents and information.
  4. - Review the necessary fees and terms.
  5. - Wait for the bank’s approval of your loan application.
  6. - You will be notified once your loan is approved.
  7. - The loan amount will be disbursed to your designated bank account.

Our Service: Your Trust, Our Responsibility.
